locks.name: ACCESS SHARE
locks.description: Read-only table lock acquired by SELECT and COPY TO; only conflicts with ACCESS EXCLUSIVE.

locks.name: ROW SHARE
locks.description: Table lock for SELECT ... FOR * variants; allows reads but conflicts with EXCLUSIVE and ACCESS EXCLUSIVE.

locks.name: ROW EXCLUSIVE
locks.description: Table lock acquired by DML (INSERT/UPDATE/DELETE/MERGE/COPY FROM); conflicts with SHARE, SHARE ROW EXCLUSIVE, EXCLUSIVE, ACCESS EXCLUSIVE.

locks.name: SHARE UPDATE EXCLUSIVE
locks.description: Allows reads and writes but blocks schema changes and VACUUM FULL; conflicts with itself and stronger locks.

locks.name: SHARE
locks.description: Acquired by CREATE INDEX; blocks concurrent data modifications but not itself.

locks.name: SHARE ROW EXCLUSIVE
locks.description: Blocks writes; allows SELECT FORs; conflicts with itself and stronger locks.

locks.name: EXCLUSIVE
locks.description: Similar to ACCESS EXCLUSIVE but allows ACCESS SHARE readers (e.g., REFRESH MATERIALIZED VIEW CONCURRENTLY).

locks.name: ACCESS EXCLUSIVE
locks.description: Strongest table lock; conflicts with all other table locks. Acquired by operations like VACUUM FULL, TRUNCATE, many ALTERs.

locks.name: FOR KEY SHARE
locks.description: Row lock: weakest; allows updates to non-unique columns; conflicts with FOR UPDATE.

locks.name: FOR SHARE
locks.description: Row lock: shared; prevents DML on the row; conflicts with NO KEY UPDATE and UPDATE.

locks.name: FOR NO KEY UPDATE
locks.description: Row lock acquired by UPDATE on non-unique columns; weaker than FOR UPDATE.

locks.name: FOR UPDATE
locks.description: Row lock: strongest; prevents UPDATE/DELETE/SELECT FOR UPDATE by other transactions.
